name: Axoken
description:
AKONEN  A GAME FOR A GAME JAM

Axoken a hyper casual bullet hell in the style of Ikaruga, the Aztecs after the conquest fled to where the others could not go, TO SPACE, after hundreds of years the roles were reversed and your duty is to defend the world. a story of revenge.

game developed in 40 hours where we face the challenge of making a game with the concept of Aztecs, Space and Science. With original art and plenty of replayability

We appreciate any feedback you can give us and let us know if you would like to see more content from Axoken

from grimorie games hope you enjoy it
